    Creation<I>
    Creation.clone(BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria)
    Clones this Creation such that the resulting clone will return the supplied BeanSelectionCriteria from any invocation of its Creation.beanSelectionCriteria() method, and, critically, if this Creation implementation implements AutoCloseableRegistry, arranges to have the resulting clone registered with its immediate ancestor (this Creation) such that closing the ancestor (this Creation) will also close the clone.
